items.title: Rename VideoTranscript to OmniTranscripts
items.description: Rename project from VideoTranscript to OmniTranscripts and formally expand scope from library-only to combined library + HTTP API. Includes: updating Go module name to 'omnitranscripts', creating engine/ package for public library consumption, adding minimal TranscriptionError with stage-specific errors, documenting GitHub repo rename steps, updating all documentation and references.
